name: Ibis Lille Centre Gares

reviews.text: Good location, rooms and bathrooms a bit larger than the average Ibis, fast wirless, staff helpful - not much else to say really.
reviews.title: one of the better Ibis

reviews.text: This is a well located budget price hotel in the centre of Lille, with the added benefit of underground car parking (but also very handy for the eurostar terminal, about 10 minutes walking distance). We took the car and travelled by ferry, so the secure onsite parking was a must. The room was slightly more basic than the equivalent Ibis hotels in the UK and there were no tea or coffee making facilities, however, there were plenty of coffee shops to choose from in the local area. The hotel was a great base for exploring Lille.
reviews.title: A centrally located budget hotel, with parking
Great location and good quality hotel
reviews.text: My partner and I wanted a hotel near the centre of Lille for the weekend and this Ibis was quite close. We booked it online and got a discount on a 2x1 offer which was great just to spend a weekend away. There are many cafes and brassieries nearby and walking to town is quite easy. The train station Lille Flandres is vey close as well as Lille Europe so the people who comes by ferry to Calais can easily take the TGV or the local trains to get to Lille. The staff was very friendly even though we spoke mostly in English after breaking the ice with a little bit of French. I would recommend this hotel and stay here again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel in August and was pleasantly surprised. The bedroom is not very big but sufficient.The bathroom was well appointed with a good size shower cubicle. The hotel has recently been refurbished with new linen and towels. If you need a quiet hotel near the station and within walking distance of all the sightseeing, this is the hotel for you! There is a restaurant in the hotel which served decent food.
reviews.title: Good value for Money

reviews.text: stayed here for 4 nights on a trip to Lille. Location is excellent just up the street from Gare de Lille - Flandres and approx 10 minutes walk from Gare de Lille - Europe.
reviews.title: convenient location near to centre

reviews.text: Rooms are smallish as is typical in France but very clean and tidy.
reviews.title: A good base

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast is good value. The staff are friendly and knowledgable - even to the extent of persevering with my schoolboy French.
reviews.title: Lille - an enjoyable stay

reviews.text: We stayed here as good reviews on TA, very close to Gare Lille FLANDRES Train Station (and also a 10-15 min walk to Gare Lille EUROPE Train Station. Note: Lille has 2 large railway stations - be noteful of which one you need to leave from when catching your train !), and this hotel is a nice, clean, pleasant and handy hotel to the centre of Lille and the nearby restaurants. Enjoy your walking around the back streets and the nearby town centre. Good spot if travelling on a Backroads World War 1 small groups tour. Enjoy Lille !
reviews.title: Great, Clean Hotel
New Year 2011/2012
reviews.text: I stayed here on a business trip and was perfect for what i needed. Close to the centre, food, bars etc. Hotel was very clean, service was great and rooms were a decent size for the price.

reviews.title: Excellent for Disabled
reviews.text: Well worth staying here if your in Lille for a few nights....

We had an enjoyable two nights stay. Rooms are basic but clean and comfortable. Public areas are pleasant. Breakfasts were the usual for French hotels, but the standard, quality and quantity were good. The employees were pleasant and helpful.
reviews.title: Would stay again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is well-located for all the attractions that Lille has to offer.
reviews.title: Would not stay again

reviews.text: Didnt enjoy our stay at the Ibis in Lille - the hotel seemed run-down, tacky and unclean. Our room was very basic which is what I would expect from an Ibis however the standard of cleaning was very very poor - you didnt even want to put your barefeet on the carpet as it seemed like it hadnt been cleaned for a very long time. Staff were not particularly helpful and it was an absolute nightmare trying to get in and out of the carpark. Needless to say we spent very little time in the hotel because we couldnt stand to be in our small dirty room. Was very disappointed and would not stay again.
reviews.title: Clean and Efficient.

reviews.text: The hotel is very centrally located, just a five minute walk to the main squares where the Big Wheel, Markets and Carousel are. The hotel also has a fairly good value car park (10 Euro for 24 Hours) underneath the hotel.
reviews.title: Covers the Basics

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are small but clean and modern, with light wood floor and furnishings, and a modern bright bathroom. The bathroom however did have some dirt and grime to the shower floor, that looked like it had simply been missed by Housekeeping. Beds were however very hard and only one pillow is provided as standard. Towels in the bathroom are also very thin, and really only do one use.
reviews.title: Exactly what we needed

reviews.text: TV should have had 2 English News Channels, one a french provided and another BBC World, however BBC World did not work.
reviews.title: Convenient Location

reviews.text: The hotel provides a 24 hour restaurant, which offes take away for your room. There is also complimentry WiFi (200MB allowance free) and also a internet station in the lobby. Reception were fairly quick and efficent, and spoke good English.
reviews.title: Looked after us very well

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recomend for a very quick stay, as a base if you plan on spending your time in the city but not for longer if you are planning to spend time enjoying the hotel facilities.
reviews.title: Good location and confortable

aka: Ibis Lille Centre Gares Hotel Lille
description: The ibis Lille Centre Gares hotel is located in the city center, 55 yards (50 m) from the Gare Lille Flandres train station and less than 10 minutes on foot from the Gare Lille Europe train station. The hotel is ideal for business and leisure trips, being close to the Grand Place, Lille Grand Palais-Zénith arena, belfry and the old town. There are 2 meeting rooms for your business seminars. Dine in L'Estaminet, our typical northern French restaurant.
